document.text:
From: 
To: 
Subject: 5113/21 Videoconference with Counsel for Bill Richardson 
Date: Thu, 13 May 2021 16:08:07 +0000 
5/13/21 Videoconference (WebEx) 
Steven Cozen 
Stephen Miller 
Barry Boss 
(Counsel for Bill Richardson) 
AUSAs 
•  Provided background on Richardson's history of public service 
•  Background re Epstein and GM 
o  Never attended parties hosted byJE or GM 
o  Never discussed topic of massages with JE or GM 
o  Never received a massage from anyone connected to JE or GM 
o  Never met any women through JE or GM 
o  Never met 
o  Never travelled on JE's private airplane 
o  Met JE/GM a few times during political campaigns in NM 
o  JE donated to BR's political campaigns; returned donation when could and otherwise donated to charity 
•  Polygraph examination in March 2021 by Barry Colvert; BR was asked if ever had intimate physical contact with El 
or if ever engaged in sexual act with Nand BR said no; results of examination were not indicative of deception on 
one scale; on another scale probability of deception is less than .01 and probably of deception on another scale 
was less than .001 
•  August 2019 —Judge Preska unsealed passages from • May 3, 2016 deposition in which • named BR as person 
GM directed her to have sex with 
•  "Catastrophic" impact on reputation, finances, and humanitarian efforts (e.g., lost speaking opportunities, lost 
Board opportunities, lost Netflix deal, impact on Richardson Center for Global Engagement to do its work) 
•  Requesting that can represent that BR is neither subject nor target of investigation and SDNY does not intend to call 
him as a witness 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
One St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, New York 10007 
EFTA00024683
